title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM
descriptions:
Introducing the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition Outdoor Watch, designed specifically for surfers and outdoor enthusiasts. With solar charging capabilities, this watch ensures you never run out of power, even in the most remote locations. 

Track your surfing sessions with features like wave counting, maximum speed tracking, distance tracking, and tide data. The watch also provides windsurfing and kiteboarding features such as GPS positioning, speed measurement, distance measurement, heart rate monitoring, and elevation data for jumps.

Stay connected with Surfline Sessions, smart notifications, and Connect IQ compatibility. With preloaded activity profiles for running, biking, swimming, and strength training, this watch is your perfect outdoor companion.

Navigate with confidence using the 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and support for GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo satellite systems. Monitor your health with features like heart rate tracking, sleep tracking, Pulse Ox monitoring, and stress tracking.

Designed to withstand the elements, the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition Outdoor Watch is water-resistant up to 100 meters, thermally resistant, and shock-resistant. The fiber-reinforced polymer case and scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass ensure durability.

Get your hands on the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition Outdoor Watch and take your outdoor adventures to the next level!

Introducing the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch, the ultimate companion for all your outdoor adventures! With solar charging capabilities, you can enjoy unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode and up to 48 hours in GPS mode with continuous solar charging. 

Designed specifically for surfers, this watch features wave counting, maximum speed tracking, distance tracking, and tide data to enhance your surfing experience. It also includes windsurfing and kiteboarding features such as GPS position tracking, speed measurement, distance measurement, heart rate monitoring, and elevation data for jumps.

Stay connected with Surfline Sessions, smart notifications, and Connect IQ compatibility. With preloaded activity profiles for running, biking, swimming, and strength training, you can track all your fitness activities seamlessly. The watch also offers advanced navigation features with a 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and support for GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo satellite systems.

Not just a sports watch, the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar also monitors your health with features like heart rate tracking, sleep tracking, Pulse Ox monitoring, and stress tracking. With a water rating of 100 meters, thermal resistance, and shock resistance, this watch is built to withstand your toughest adventures.

Don't miss out on the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch - the perfect blend of style, functionality, and durability for all your outdoor pursuits!

Monitor your health with features like heart rate tracking, sleep tracking, Pulse Ox monitoring, and stress tracking. With a water rating of 100 meters, thermal and shock resistance, and a durable fiber-reinforced polymer case with scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass, this watch is built to withstand even the most rugged adventures.
